docs.title: Interests
docs.text: Hi! I specialize in Embedded Firmware, BSP (Linux, RTOS), and DSP systems. I like learning the latest technologies and am interested in various things related to software and hardware.

docs.title: Blogger
docs.text:
• Purpose Establish a unified system to manage, maintain, and archive all personal technical blogs across platforms such as Blogger and Medium.
  • Goals
    • Centralize blog content management across multiple publishing platforms
    • Maintain long-term ownership and backup of all written technical content
    • Enable efficient reuse and restructuring of blog content for global audiences

docs.title: Medium Blogs
docs.text:
• Purpose Rewrite and publish English Medium articles based on existing Korean technical posts from my Blogger, preserving technical depth and original intent.
  • Assets/Links
    • My Technical Blog(Blogger/Blogspot)
      • My Blogger: https://ahyuo79.blogspot.com
    • Medium Draft and Blogger Backup
      • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/Medium
      • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/medium-preview
    • Medium only Preview
      • WEB: https://jeonghunlee.github.io/medium-preview/
  • Goals
    • Produce high-quality English technical articles derived from Korean originals by using ChatGPT
    • Preserve structure, diagrams, and technical reasoning during translation
    • Maintain an independent backup of Medium content outside the Medium platform

docs.title: Blogger Module
docs.text:
• Purpose Modularize and maintain JavaScript and CSS assets to optimize the Blogspot UI while ensuring long-term maintainability and reusability.
  • Assets/Links
    • Javas Script and CSS (Module)
      • Module: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/blogspot/tree/gh-pages
      • WEB: https://jeonghunlee.github.io/blogspot/
      • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/blogspot

docs.title: WIFI Sniffer (ESP32-S3)
docs.text:
• Links:
    • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/wifisniffer
    • ReadTheDocs-CFG: https://app.readthedocs.org/projects/wifisniffer/
    • ReadTheDocs-WEB: https://wifisniffer.readthedocs.io/ko/latest/
    • Github Pages : https://jeonghunlee.github.io/wifisniffer/
  • Summary 
    - Developed a WiFi sniffing tool using ESP32-S3 and integrated packet analysis through Wireshark
- Experimented with multiple documentation pipelines including:
    - MkDocs (Material) + Doxygen
    - Sphinx + Doxygen (with Breathe/Exhale)
    - ReadTheDocs deployment testing
- Validated USB CDC streaming and real-time packet monitoring performance
  • Releated My Technical Blogs
    • Categories - ESP Tags
      • MCU-ESP32
      • MCU-ESP32S3
      • MCU-ESP32-MEM
      • MCU-ESP32-BT
      • MCU-ESP32-WIFI
    • Categories — Wireshark Tags
      • Tool-Wireshark
    • Categories — Documentation Tags
      • DevOps-Sphinx
      • DevOps-MkDocs
      • DevOps-ReadTheDocs
    • Categories — USB Tags
      • USB-Protocol

docs.title: ESP-CSI
docs.text:
• Purpose Test WIFI CSI based on ESP32-S3 because of WIFI Sensing

  • Links:

    • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/esp-csi
  • TEST Result:
    • https://github.com/JeonghunLee/esp-csi/blob/master/ESP32-S3_TEST.md

docs.title: WIFI Sensing Array
docs.text:
• Purpose Research WiFi Sensing Array using ESP32 devices, focusing on CSI-based spatial sensing and multi-device synchronization for indoor environment awareness.

have to compare with BLE Channel Sounding and FMCW Radar

  • Links:
    • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/pyespargos

  • WIFI Sensing Array Study:
    • Main Web: https://espargos.net/
    • ESPargos Docs: https://espargos.net/docs/
  • Samples
    • https://espargos.net/datasets/data/espargos-0005/
    • https://espargos.net/datasets/data/espargos-0007/

docs.title: LoRA WAN
docs.text: Goals: - Implement a Semtech SX1302/SX1303 based LoRaWAN gateway - Support packet forwarder and basic network server connectivity

docs.title: LoRa Gateway
docs.text:
• Purpose LoRa Gateway(LoRaWan) based on Semtech
  • Links:
    • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/lora_gateway
    • GIT: https://github.com/JeonghunLee/packet_forwarder
  • KCMVP
    • WEB: https://www.keypair.co.kr/pages/secureic-kcmvp-en.html
  • Summary 
    Enhanced LoRaWAN stack with DTLS and KCMVP-based authentication & encryption.
